articles.title: Don't expect big reveals at Summer Games Fest, says Geoff Keighley - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Most games shown at Summer Games Fest 2024 will not be new, says Geoff Keighley. Don't expect Metal Gear Solid Delta, in other words.
articles.content: Since the death of E3, June has descended into a chaotic clusterfunk of trailers, broadcasts, announcements, and a generalised frenzy of publicity-seeking barking noises. Summer Game Fest has emerged… [+2190 chars]

articles.author: Jeremy Howick
articles.title: 'Placebo' or 'sham' surgery is not a cruel trick – it can be very effective - The Conversation
articles.description: So-called ‘sham’ or ‘placebo’ surgery can be more effective than more invasive surgery. So why aren’t we using it more often?
articles.content:
Ten years ago, a scan showed that I had torn the meniscus in my knee. The pain was bad and I was limping a lot of the time. My doctor recommended arthroscopic knee surgery to fix it. 
Being scared o… [+5201 chars]
